dmca.title: shopforphones.co.uk #6 (2/7)
dmca.body:
[Sender]
[Sender] 
[Sender] 
Bedford 
MK41 0AA 
UK 
7th February 2005 
Google, Inc. 
Attn: Customer Support, DMCA Complaints 
[Recipient] 
Mountain View, CA 94043 
Dear Sir or Madam, 
1. The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on the following page: 
a. http://www.shopforphones.co.uk/samsung-e600.htm 
b. http://www.shopforphones.co.uk/motorola-v80.htm 
c. http://www.shopforphones.co.uk/nokia-6260.htm 
2. The search query and web pages with the unauthorized material are: 
a. Search Query: MOTOROLA RAZR V3 
Infringing Web Pages: 
http://www.pure-mobile.com/catalog/product_info.php?products_id=150 
http://www.pure-mobile.com/catalog/product_info_includes.php?cPath=29_27&products_id=150 
b. Search Query: MOTOROLA V80 
Infringing Web Pages: 
http://www.pure-mobile.com/catalog/product_info.php?products_id=152 
http://www.pure-mobile.com/catalog/product_info_features.php?cPath=29_24&products_id=152 
http://www.pure-mobile.com/catalog/product_info_specs.php?cPath=29_24&products_id=152 
c. Search Query: NOKIA 6260 
Infringing Web Pages: 
http://www.pure-mobile.com/catalog/product_info_includes.php?products_id=196 
http://www.pure-mobile.com/catalog/product_info_specs.php?products_id=196 
http://www.pure-mobile.com/catalog/product_info.php?cPath=29_21&products_id=196 
3. My contact information: [Sender]
4. Infringer's Contact Information: infringer is registered through the "Domains By Proxy service", Domains 
by Proxy, Inc. , [Alleged Infringer], Scottsdale, Arizona 85260, United States 
(please note that Domains by Proxy inc are not the copyright infringer). Email puremobile.
[Alleged Infringer]. No other contact information is supplied by the infringer. 
5. I,[Sender], have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the 
allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law. 
6. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the 
copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly 
infringed. 
The web site operators have been contacted before with regards to this and have not removed the copyrighted 
material as requested. 
Sincerely, 

[Sender], shopforphones. co.uk 
Phone: [Sender] 
Fax: [Sender] 
Email: [Sender]
